Package image.markup

Class ImageMarkup

java.lang.Object
image.markup.ImageMarkup
public class ImageMarkup
extends java.lang.Object
Prepare an image for HeightMap Generation This class is designed to filter noise and transform the raw photo into a picture that can be processed by the HeightMap class Image is expected to be somewhat of a maze where the walls are colored black with everything else being white
Since:
2020-07-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Martin Edmunds

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ImageMarkup​(java.lang.String filename)
    Constructor: attempts to load file for processing

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Blur​(int size_x, int size_y)
    Blurs the image using GaussianBlur with a (size_x, size_y) kernel
    void Clamp​(double value)
    Clamps the pixel values in the image against a value: Pixels less than the threshold are set to 0.
    void ClampA()
    Clamps the pixel values in the image against the average pixel of the image
    void ClampSTD()
    Default Clamp call that clamps the image to within 1 standard deviation
    void ClampSTD​(int num_std)
    Clamps the pixel values in the image against a multiple of the standard deviation
    void Filter​(int num_times)
    Performs multiple 9x9 blurs and clamps within two standard deviations to reduce noise in image
    double GetAveragePixel()
    Calculates the average pixel value of the image
    java.awt.image.BufferedImage GetBufferedImage()
    Returns the current Mat image as a BufferedImage usable by the Java 2D module

    Returns image height

    Calculates the standard deviation of the pixel values in the image

    Returns image width

    Inverts the pixel values of the image

    Performs an OpenCV Sobel Line Detection function on the image

      Parameters:

      Throws:

  • Method Details

    • Blur

      public void Blur​(int size_x, int size_y)
      Blurs the image using GaussianBlur with a (size_x, size_y) kernel
      Parameters:
      size_x - kernel size in x dim
      size_y - kernel size in y dim

    • Filter

      public void Filter​(int num_times)
      Performs multiple 9x9 blurs and clamps within two standard deviations to reduce noise in image
      Parameters:
      num_times - number of times to perform filtering

    • GetAveragePixel

      public double GetAveragePixel()
      Calculates the average pixel value of the image
      Returns:
      double returns the pixel average of the image

    • GetStdDev

      public double GetStdDev()
      Calculates the standard deviation of the pixel values in the image
      Returns:
      double returns the pixel standard deviation of the image

      public java.awt.image.BufferedImage GetBufferedImage()
      Returns the current Mat image as a BufferedImage usable by the Java 2D module
      Returns:
      BufferedImage Mat converted to BufferedImage

    • ClampSTD

      public void ClampSTD()
      Default Clamp call that clamps the image to within 1 standard deviation

    • Clamp

      public void Clamp​(double value)
      Clamps the pixel values in the image against a value: Pixels less than the threshold are set to 0. Everything else is set to 255.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to be clamped against

    • ClampSTD

      public void ClampSTD​(int num_std)
      Clamps the pixel values in the image against a multiple of the standard deviation
      Parameters:
      num_std - number of standard deviations to clamp to

    • ClampA

      public void ClampA()
      Clamps the pixel values in the image against the average pixel of the image

    • Sobel

      public void Sobel()
      Performs an OpenCV Sobel Line Detection function on the image

      public void Invert()
      Inverts the pixel values of the image
